select distinct cast(caption||'('||name||')' as varchar(500)) title, name,caption from tstructs order by 1

a22.l: select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select regexp_split_to_table(sprocessname,',') process,actorname from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3))a where process = :processname union all select 'None',2 ord from dual)a order by ord,1

select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select regexp_split_to_table(sprocessname,',') process,actorname from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3))a where process = :processname )a order by ord,1

sendtoactor.a14: iif(allowsendflg={4} & ISEmpty(sendtoactor)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select transid from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname and stransid !='pgv2c' and indexno < :indexno order by indexno desc limit 1

select cast(fcaption as varchar(300)) ,fname,ord from (select caption||'-('||fname||')' fcaption, concat(tstruct,'.',fname) fname,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :fromfieldtransid union all select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')), regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),2 ord from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno)a order by ord,1

formfieldscaption.a14: iif(assignto={From form field} & ISEmpty(formfieldscaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select taskname from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname and indexno < :indexno and (length(ParentTaskName)=0 or ParentTaskName is null) order by indexno

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and "datatype"='d' union all select concat('AxVars_',b.db_function,'-(',a.db_vartype,db_varname,')') fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and "datatype"='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')) taskparams,regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,',') fname, substring(regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),position ('.' in regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','))+1,1) dtype from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno )a where dtype='d' )a order by 4,1

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and "datatype"='d' union all select concat('AxVars_',b.db_function,'-(',a.db_vartype,db_varname,')') fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and "datatype"='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')) taskparams,regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,',') fname, substring(regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),position ('.' in regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','))+1,1) dtype from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno )a where dtype='d' )a order by 4,1

select cast(axpdef_peg_actorid as numeric) from (select axpdef_peg_actorid from axpdef_peg_actor where 'None'!=:assigntoactor and actorname = :assigntoactor union all select axpdef_peg_actorid from axpdef_peg_actor where 'None'=:assigntoactor and process = :processname and taskname = :taskname)a

usebusinessdatelogic.a2: Consider only business dates for Escalations/Reminders

a22.l: select case when :recid = 0 then concat(':', :keyfield) else :displaytitle end from dual
select case when :recid = 0 then concat(':', :keyfield) else :displaycontent end from dual

select cast(mslist as varchar(100)) from (select regexp_split_to_table('Approve,Return,Reject',',') mslist where 'Approve' = :tasktype union all select regexp_split_to_table('Check,Return,Reject',',') mslist where 'Check' = :tasktype)z

select cast(cnd as varchar(50)) cnd,cndval,ord from (select 'Set value to field' cnd,4 cndval,6 ord union all select 'Show' cnd,2 cndval,7 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Hide' cnd,2 cndval,8 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Enable' cnd,2 cndval,9 ord )a order by ord
select :cmd from dual

select cast(mslist as varchar(500)) mslist,ord from (select caption || '-(' || fname || ')' mslist,2 ord from axpflds where tstruct =:transid union all select caption || '-(' || dname || ')',1 ord from axpdc where tstruct=:transid)a order by ord,mslist
select fn_ruledef_table_genaxscript( :cmd, :tbldtls, cast( :pcnd as numeric))

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(500)) fldcaption,fname,setvaluefor,cnd,ord from( select concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') fldcaption,fname ,case when asgrid ='T' then 'activerow' else '0' end setvaluefor, 'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid)a order by 5,1

select distinct cast(concat(b.caption,'-(',b.name,')') as varchar(500)) fcaption,b.name from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.processname = :processname and a.transid=b.name and a.indexno < :indexno order by 1
select concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') mslist,fname from axpflds where tstruct=:setval_formname order by 1
SELECT fn_ruledef_table_genaxscript('',:tblsetval,7)
select concat('if recordid > 0 ',chr(10),:setvalscr,chr(10))

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification-(static.ax__don)' fldcaption,'static.ax__don' fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation-(static.ax__doi)' fldcaption,'static.ax__doi' fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')) taskparams,regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,',') fname, substring(regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),position ('.' in regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','))+1,1) dtype from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno )a where dtype='d' )a order by 4,1

rem_mailndays.a2: Reminder mail for every Nth day

a22.l: select generate_series(1,30)
select name mslist,'Templates' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axnotificationdef order by name

select concat(cast(numb as varchar(10)),case when numb='1' then ' day' when numb not in('Auto','1') then ' days' end),ord,case when numb='Auto' then 0 else cast(numb as numeric) end ord1 from (select cast(generate_series(1,30) as varchar(2)) numb,2 ord from dual union all select 'Auto',1 ord)b order by 3
select generate_series(1,30)

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification-(static.ax__don)' fldcaption,'static.ax__don' fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation-(static.ax__doi)' fldcaption,'static.ax__doi' fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')) taskparams,regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,',') fname, substring(regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),position ('.' in regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','))+1,1) dtype from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno )a where dtype='d' )a order by 4,1

esc_mailndays.a2: Escalation mail for every Nth day

a22.l: select cast(cnd as varchar(50)) cnd,flg,ord from (select 'Auto approve' cnd,1 flg,1 ord from dual where 'Cal days' = :esc_daytype union all select 'Actor',2 flg,3 ord union all select 'Process owner',3 flg,4 ord union all select 'Reporting manager',4 flg,5 ord union all select 'Skip level',5 flg,7 ord union all select 'Auto reject',6 flg,2 ord from dual where 'Cal days' = :esc_daytype union all select 'Initator reporting manager',7 flg,6 ord )a order by ord

select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select regexp_split_to_table(sprocessname,',') process,actorname from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3))a where process = :processname)a where 'Actor' = :escalate order by ord,1
select name mslist,'Templates' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axnotificationdef order by name

select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select regexp_split_to_table(sprocessname,',') process,actorname from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3))a where process = :processname)a where 'Actor' = :escalate_notifyto order by ord,1

select cast(grp as varchar(300))grp,cnd,processownerflg,powner from (select actorname||'-(Actor)' grp,'Actor' cnd,1 processownerflg,actorname powner from axpdef_peg_actor where 1=2 union all select groupname||'-(Role)','Role',2 processownerfld,groupname from axusergroups)a order by 2,1

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification-(static.ax__don)' fldcaption,'static.ax__don' fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Date of initiation-(static.ax__doi)' fldcaption,'static.ax__doi' fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select concat(caption,'-(',tstruct,'.',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid union all select concat('AxVars_',b.db_function,'-(',a.db_vartype,db_varname,')') fldcaption, concat(db_vartype||db_varname) fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,concat(datatype,fname) fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and "datatype"='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select concat(b.caption,'-',regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparamsui,',')) taskparams,regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,',') fname, substring(regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','),position ('.' in regexp_split_to_table(a.taskparams,','))+1,1) dtype from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno )a where dtype='d' )a order by 4,1

select string_agg(fname, ',') from (select substring(unnest(string_to_array( :taskparamsui , ',')), position('-(' in unnest(string_to_array( :taskparamsui , ',')))+ 2, abs((position('-(' in unnest(string_to_array( :taskparamsui , ',')))+ 2) - length(substring(unnest(string_to_array( :taskparamsui , ',')), 1, length(unnest(string_to_array( :taskparamsui , ',')))))))fname where :taskparamsui is not null) a

select cast(script as varchar(100)) mslist,'Mappings' groupby,1 grouporder, 'F' selected from (select distinct script from axtoolbar a where script is not null and stype='tstruct' and name=:transid union all select gname from axpgenmaps a where tstruct = :transid union all select mname from axpmdmaps a where tstruct = :transid )a order by 1
select regexp_split_to_table(cards,',') mslist,'Cards' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axpdef_peg_processmaster where caption= :processname order by 1
select a.taskname from axprocessdefv2 a where a.axpdef_peg_processmasterid = :axpdef_peg_processmasterid and a.stransid='pgv2m' order by 1

select string_agg(cast(axprocessdefv2id as varchar(15)),',') from axprocessdefv2 where axpdef_peg_processmasterid = :axpdef_peg_processmasterid and taskname in (select regexp_split_to_table( :allowedittasks,','))

select string_agg(scr,'') from (select cast(split_part(regexp_split_to_table( :formctrltmp ,'~nl~,'),'~nc~',1) as numeric) ord, concat(replace(split_part(regexp_split_to_table( :formctrltmp ,'~nl~,'),'~nc~',2),'~nl~',''),chr(10)) scr from dual where length(:formctrltmp) > 1 order by 1)a where length(:formctrltmp) > 1

pgv2a0.a2: To create entry in process user

exprset.l7: firesql({a},{call fn_axprocessdefv2_index_update( :processname,cast( :indexno as numeric),'Insert',cast( :recordid as numeric),cast( :oldindexno as numeric))})
exprset.l9: firesql({a},{call fn_axprocessdefv2_index_update( :processname,cast( :indexno as numeric),'Update',cast( :recordid as numeric),cast( :oldindexno as numeric))})

exprset.l2: firesql({a},{call fn_axprocessdefv2_index_update( :processname,cast( :indexno as numeric),'Delete',cast( :precid as numeric),cast( :oldindexno as numeric))})
